imdb.plot outline: The story dives headfirst into the shallow end of the online dating pool to expose the hypocrisy of Internet dating companies: while they project a sentimental, romantic front, they're more interested in cold, hard cash. We meet Claire, a woman whose idea of a hot Saturday night involves a Hoarders marathon and eating frosting straight out of a can. However, when she's hired by the world's largest online dating site, Love's Bounty Hunter, as a "Featured Dater," she finds her love life turned entirely upside down. As the whole world watches, Claire's romantic exploits spiral into sheer insanity.
imdb.title: Love's Bounty Hunter
